# New CBER chief Prasad is readying 'massive framework' around vaccines, Makary says

> Source: [https://endpts.com/new-cber-chief-is-readying-massive-framework-for-vaccines-makary-says/?u=786c1a58-a68e-4805-8b2a-95166d105077&amp;s=email&amp;c=524130ce-85ee95ed-e6f3e248&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=812%20-%20Prasad%20set%20to%20unleash%20a%20vaccine%20framework%20The%20race%20to%20a%20custom%20CRISPR%20drug%20Insider&amp;utm_content=812%20-%20Prasad%20set%20to%20unleash%20a%20vaccine%20framework%20The%20race%20to%20a%20custom%20CRISPR%20drug%20Insider+CID_37a34b9099dc776717e31622f3e542b9&amp;utm_source=ENDPOINTS%20emails&amp;utm_term=New%20CBER%20chief%20Prasad%20is%20readying%20massive%20framework%20around%20vaccines%20Makary%20says](https://endpts.com/new-cber-chief-is-readying-massive-framework-for-vaccines-makary-says/?u=786c1a58-a68e-4805-8b2a-95166d105077&amp;s=email&amp;c=524130ce-85ee95ed-e6f3e248&amp;utm_medium=email&amp;utm_campaign=812%20-%20Prasad%20set%20to%20unleash%20a%20vaccine%20framework%20The%20race%20to%20a%20custom%20CRISPR%20drug%20Insider&amp;utm_content=812%20-%20Prasad%20set%20to%20unleash%20a%20vaccine%20framework%20The%20race%20to%20a%20custom%20CRISPR%20drug%20Insider+CID_37a34b9099dc776717e31622f3e542b9&amp;utm_source=ENDPOINTS%20emails&amp;utm_term=New%20CBER%20chief%20Prasad%20is%20readying%20massive%20framework%20around%20vaccines%20Makary%20says)

# New CBER chief Prasad is ready­ing 'mas­sive frame­work' around vac­cines, Makary says

### [Zachary Brennan](https://endpoints.news/author/zachary-brennan/ "See all stories by Zachary Brennan")

#### Senior Editor

Vinay Prasad may have just start­ed as the new di­rec­tor of the FDA’s bi­o­log­ics cen­ter, but he’s “plan­ning to un­leash a mas­sive frame­work” on vac­cines …
